definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
as for/as to/to go so far as to
and even/to go so far as to
down to/up to/to the extent that...
unlikely to go so far as to/not as bad as
down to/up to/to such an extent as to .../also written 以至於|以至于[yi3 zhi4 yu2]
(idiom) up to the present/even now/now (in contrast with the past)/at this late hour
the most honorable/the most respected/supreme/(archaic) the emperor

sentences.english: These ignition wires send the charge to each spark plug.
sentences.chinese: 這些點火導線將電荷運送至每個火花塞。

sentences.english: Please fax this form to Beijing IHAC project office.
sentences.chinese: 請將此表傳真至北京藝匯家項目辦。

sentences.english: More than 2,000 women aged 18-34 were  interviewed for the poll.
sentences.chinese: 共有兩千多名18歲至34歲的女性參與了該項調查。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket between Hong Kong and Sanya on Dragonair.
sentences.chinese: 港龍航空公司來回香港至三亞經濟客位機票乙張。

sentences.english: Its Tochigi and Iwaki plants, north of Tokyo, would remain shut until Friday.
sentences.chinese: 位於東京北部櫪木和磐城的工廠將停產至週五。

sentences.english: Ithas been translated into tens of languages, spread love to all theworld.
sentences.chinese: 被翻譯成數十種語言，將愛傳至世界各地。

sentences.english: Epidural migration of a sequestrated disc to posterior epidural space is rare.
sentences.chinese: 遊離的髓核移位至後方硬膜外間隙是非常少見的。

sentences.english: Use 2 to 3 minutes eash time, it can be used for around two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 用2至3分鐘的時間鏽，它可以用於兩個星期左右。

sentences.english: The picking time for spring teas in China is usually from March to early May.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，春茶的採摘時間通常是每年的三月至五月初。

sentences.english: The operation to correct hip dysplasia produced an abnormality in acetabular anteversion .
sentences.chinese: 手術可改變髖臼前傾角，部分會至異常範圍。
這個過程大約需要14至48個小時。

sentences.english: Some agents have 20-30 employees on a monthly payroll, he said.
sentences.chinese: 一些代理每月會有20至30民僱員，他補充道。

sentences.english: IHG announces the brands expansion into Europe.
sentences.chinese: IHG宣佈英迪格酒店品牌擴張至歐洲。

sentences.english: Typically, the modem is connected to one of the serial ports on the computer.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，數據機會連接至電腦上的其中一個序列埠。

sentences.english: The gold and gold alloy hydride migrate to shallow regions of the crust.
sentences.chinese: 金及金合金氫化物遷移至地殼淺部。

definition: to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])

from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
Yanchang county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi
along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge
